languages.text: "Еще один наш грех. Но оправданный. Ему не стоило препятствовать тебе".
"Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."
languages.original_text: "Еще один наш грех. Но оправданный. Ему не стоило препятствовать тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But this time it's a justified one. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But this time it's a justified one. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: « Nous avons commis un nouveau crime, mais cette fois, il était justifié. Il n'aurait pas dû s'opposer à vous. »
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons commis un nouveau crime, mais cette fois, il était justifié. Il n'aurait pas dû s'opposer à vous. »
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: «Otra ofensa por nuestra parte. Pero esta vez está justificada; no debería haberse opuesto a usted».
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."

traits.locale_text: «Otra ofensa por nuestra parte. Al menos esta vez está justificada; no debería haberse opuesto a ti».
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: “我们又攻击别人了。不过，这次攻击是合理行为，他根本不该反抗你。”
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."

traits.locale_text: “我们又攻击别人了。不过，这次攻击是合理行为，他根本不该反对你。”
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Ein weiteres Eurer Vergehen. Doch dieses Mal ein gerechtfertigtes. Er hätte sich nicht gegen Euch stellen sollen."
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."

traits.locale_text: "Ein weiteres Eurer Vergehen. Doch dieses Mal ein gerechtfertigtes. Er hätte sich nicht gegen Euch stellen sollen."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: 「それもまた我々の罪だ。しかし、今回は正統なものだ。彼はあなたに逆らうべきではなかった」
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."

traits.locale_text: 「それもまた我々の罪だ。しかし、今回は正統なものだ。彼はあなたに逆らうべきではなかった」
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Bizim suçlarımızdan biri. Fakat bu sefer hak yerini buldu. Sana karşı gelmemeliydi."
languages.original_text: "Another offence of ours. But a justified one this time. He should not have opposed you."
